definitions.definition: Not perceptible , not detectable , too small in magnitude to be observed.
examples: We all missed the imperceptible shake of his head as he tried to warn us without being seen.

definitions.definition: Beyond the purview of man; too great and all-encompassing to be perceived.

main_definition: Not perceptible , not detectable , too small in magnitude to be observed.
secondary_definitions: Beyond the purview of man; too great and all-encompassing to be perceived.
